title: How to go about learning to hip hop dance at home - Quora

response.answer_text: You may watch YOUTUBE and learn someone’s choreography but when it comes to learning Knowledge IS A MUST. Best way to gain knowledge is to attend workshops and classes. As you want to learn hiphop at home, I would suggest take online sessions. You can start by beginners classes where you’ll learn the basics. First build up and make your Foundation strong and then you’ll evolve eventually. Once you start learning rest of your way will be clear right infront of you. Keep these 3 thing in your mind. FOUNDATIONTECHNICALITYMUSICALITYAnd you’ll see the difference in you. all the best :)

hey you got youtube right ? i mean everyone dont get opportunity to attend workshop and classes…and i guess you have the same issue , you are limited upto youtube . so what i suggest is as you said you want to learn hiphop start with old school stuff ..go to youtube and search for hip hop dictionary and you will b able to find videos on old school,middle school,new school etc.. because this are must as this are your foundation…so start with foundation learn and practice till your muscle memory got used to it..and then you try to make your own moves taking ideas from basic…
